name: Snack Guys
summary: Get ready to embark on an electrifying experience, entering competitions full of obstacles and furious enemies in an exciting virtual reality (VR) game. With a MULTIPLAYER mode and a variety of different courses, each player must reach the finish line as quickly as possible to save Snackland from the legion of intergalactic robots. But the fun doesn't stop there! Only a limited number of players can work together, and with each round, the game becomes more challenging with more enemies and increasingly...
